mil7.3.3:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘bijassa dve angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani dve angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.3.3:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, bijam appakampi samanam bhaddake khette vuttam deve samma dharam pavecchante subahuni phalani anudassati;
mil7.3.3:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena yatha patipaditam silam kevalam samannaphalamanudassati.
mil7.3.3:1.5: Idam, maharaja, bijassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.3.3:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, bijam suparisodhite khette ropitam khippameva samviruhati;
mil7.3.3:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena manasam supariggahitam sunnagare parisodhitam satipatthanakhettavare khittam khippameva viruhati.
mil7.3.3:2.3: Idam, maharaja, bijassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
